Description: Icon-only buttons must have accessible names
All form controls need labels or aria-label
Interactive elements must support keyboard interaction
Use semantic HTML before ARIA attributes
Async updates need aria-live for screen readers
Decorative icons should be hidden from screen readers
All interactive elements need visible focus states
Never remove outline without providing replacement
Checkbox/radio must share hit target with label
Inputs need autocomplete attribute for autofill
Use semantic input type attributes
Never prevent paste functionality
Disable spellcheck on emails and codes
Keep submit enabled and show spinner during requests
Show error messages inline near the problem field
Do: Inline error with focus on first error

Description: Virtualize lists exceeding 50 items
Do: Use virtual list for large datasets

Description: Avoid layout reads during render phase
Do: Read layout in effects or callbacks

Description: Group DOM operations to minimize reflows
Add preconnect links for CDN domains
Lazy-load images below the fold
URL should reflect current UI state
Stateful components should support deep-linking
Do: Enable sharing current view via URL

Description: Destructive actions require confirmation
Use proper Unicode characters
Handle text overflow properly
Use non-breaking spaces for units and brand names
Never disable zoom in viewport meta
Avoid transition: all - specify properties
Never use outline-none without replacement
Use Intl for date/number formatting
Set color-scheme on html for dark themes to fix scrollbar and inputs
Do: Add color-scheme: dark to html element

Description: Theme-color meta tag should match page background
Do: Set meta theme-color to match bg

Description: Native select elements need explicit bg and color in dark mode on Windows
Do: Set explicit background-color and color on select elements

Description: Use active voice in UI copy for clarity and directness
Use Title Case for headings and button labels (Chicago style)
Do: Title Case for headings and buttons

Description: Use numerals instead of spelling out numbers for counts
Button labels should describe the specific action
Error messages should include a fix or next step not just the problem
Code Example Good: 'API key invalid. Generate a new key in Settings.'

Description: Use second person (you) and avoid first person in UI text
Use & instead of 'and' where space is constrained
Use Intl.NumberFormat for number and currency formatting
Detect language via Accept-Language header or navigator.languages not IP
Set -webkit-tap-highlight-color intentionally on touch devices
During drag operations disable text selection and set inert on dragged elements
Do: Set inert and user-select: none during drag

Description: Use autoFocus only on desktop for single primary input; avoid on mobile
Do: autoFocus on desktop primary input only
Code Example Bad: autoFocus // opens keyboard on mobile unexpectedly

Description: Full-bleed layouts need env(safe-area-inset-*) for notches and rounded corners
Prefer CSS flex/grid over JavaScript measurement for layout
Inputs with value prop need onChange handler or use defaultValue for uncontrolled
Do: Add onChange to controlled inputs or use defaultValue

Description: Use suppressHydrationWarning only on elements with expected server/client differences
Don't use div/span with onClick for navigation or actions - use button or anchor
Do: Use button for actions and anchor for navigation

Description: All img elements need explicit width and height to prevent CLS
Do: Set width and height on images

Description: autoFocus should have clear justification - avoid on mobile and multi-input forms
Code Example Good: autoFocus // single search input on desktop
Code Example Bad: autoFocus // on every form's first input
